Event.name: Hunting
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fex name="Hunter">Hunter</fex> tries to gain <fex name="Food">Food</fex> by way of outsmarting or tracking a living. The <fex name="Hunter">Hunter</fex> hopes the attempt will result in the catching and killing of the living entity that is intended for human consumption. The act of seeking <fex name="Food">Food</fex> inherently involves the assistance of some tool, which can be an extension of the <fex name="Hunter">Hunter</fex>'s body or an artifact fashioned or exploited for the use of food seeking, catching, and/or killing.
<ex><fex name="Place">In the Congo</fex>, <fex name="Hunter">he</fex> hunted <fex name="Food">big game</fex> <fex name="Particular_iteration">for the first time</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Hunter">People</fex> <fex name="Time">still</fex> <t>fish</t> <fex name="Food">bass</fex> <fex name="Ground">in the lake</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Hunter">Folks from Northern California</fex> <t>hunt</t> <fex name="Manner">brilliantly</fex>. <fex name="Food">INI</fex> </ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Hunter
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Hunter</fen> is the agent hoping to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Food
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Food</fen> is the sought-out item by the <fen>Hunter</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Instrument</fen> is used by the <fen>Hunter</fen> as a tool to help obtain <fen>Food</fen>. (This tool is not limited to typical artifacts and can be hands, arms, and other atypical hunting and fishing instruments.)
<ex>Late Prehistoric peoples <t>hunted</t> <fex name="Instrument">with the bow and arrow</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>For what length of time the <fen>Hunter</fen> attempted to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
<ex>We all <t>fished</t> <fex name="Duration">for several hours</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Hunter</fen> makes the attempt for <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which an attempt at achieving a <fen>Food</fen> obtainment.</def-root>

Arg.name: Outcome
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The failure or success of an attempt.
<ex>She <fex name="Outcome">successfully</fex> <t>hunted</t> and ate a porcupine.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The greater geographic location where the <fen>Hunter</fen> attempts to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
<ex>Europe's billionaires <t>hunt</t> boars <fex name="Place">in Romania</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action that the <fen>Hunter</fen> intends to accomplish by seeking <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the amount of effort the <fen>Hunter</fen> puts into his attempt to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Ground
Arg.definition: <def-root>This is the entity to which the <fen>Hunter</fen> pays attention. It is referred to as <fen>Ground</fen> because it serves as the background or context for the <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.</def-root>

Arg.name: Co-participant
Arg.definition: <def-root>Co_participant is an entity that participates in a coordinated way in the same event as the primary protagonist, regardless of whether the protagonist, and hence the <fex name="Co-participant">Co-participant</fex>, is more agent- or more undergoer-like.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: hunt.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: The act of seeking out animal food by way of tracking and chasing with a hoped final result of a successful kill.

lexUnit.name: fish.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: To seek water-born living flesh through the use of effective tools.
